description: On March 13th, 2003 - the night before Wrestlemania XX - World Wrestling Entertainment held a very special ceremony to induct 11 legends in its hallowed Hall of Fame. These are the highlights of that ceremony.
keywords: world wrestling entertainment,hall of fame,professional wrestling,tv special
name: WWE Hall of Fame 2004

review.name: Pete Rose In WWE Hall Of Fame?!
review.reviewBody: I question none of the inductees in the WWE Hall Of Fame, but why Pete Rose?! He made three appearances at Wrestlemania and was brutalized by Kane each time. He even was a victim of Rikishi's stinky face. There's gotta be a reason why he was inducted, especially before veterans such as Hulk Hogan, Bret Hart, and Roddy Piper, I know they had past beef with McMahon, but they're more deserving than a former baseball player whose memories in wrestling are being embarrassed by Kane. So, this year they inducted William Perry, former NFL star in the Hall Of Fame. He only made one appearance at Wrestlemania 2 and eliminated Big John Studd. I suppose next year they'll induct Mr. T and Lawrence Taylor. I just hope that more ring veterans will be inducted before other sport stars do.
